channel.title: So many perverts out there
channel.description:
Ok i decided to try an experiment... Go into yahoo chat rooms pretending to be a 13 year old girl.. within 5 minutes my profile had views by 33 males and 3 females. and within 2 minutes of logging into the chat i have 8 guys pming me asking me how i am, what im wearing, if im hot, what i look like. dress sizes Etc etc..
You guys should really try this... its fucking funny..
Anyhow i get pmed by a women who works for yahoo saying that its not acceptable for me to be there and i should leave... i tell her im working for the BBC and that yahoo chatrooms are being investigated by Panorama Again and i get banned straight away..
Anyhow before i got banned she said that she and the other employees were there to protect young people. so i turned round and said seriosly if i log in and within 5 min 10+ guys asking me how old i am and what im wearing and stuff you aint doing a good job.. Maybe You should do what i did to fish them out.. then i got asked to leave and then i told em about the BBC part and thats when i got banned.

fuck your a douche. Porn doesn’t go turning everyone into pedophiles, if it did, every man would be one.

Like i care what you say?

Please save yourself the embarrassment and stop talking now…or at least show me some studies to prove your “theory.”
[/quote]
This “embaracment” is the truth, if you look at porn your dirty, none the less selfish. Your selfish because you buy other pictures of girls when they need money, your using them.
No, don’t say they wanted to so i went ahead, its taking advantage of them[/quote]
but, but, i go to mcdonalds and buy food. AM I USING THE MCDONALDS STAFF, PLZ TELL. How is it using them? WHY DO THESE ANTI-PORN TYPES ALWAYS FORGET THE MALES?

btw bb, what are you wearing?

item.title: So many perverts out there
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“Schizzo, post:18, topic:172143”][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=232271.msg1988164#msg1988164 date=1199937878]
This “embaracment” is the truth, if you look at porn your dirty, none the less selfish. Your selfish because you buy other pictures of girls when they need money, your using them.
No, don’t say they wanted to so i went ahead, its taking advantage of them
[/quote]

That’s one of the most idiotic things I’ve ever read. No one’s forcing any of those girls to do anything. They choose to do it themselves. There would be no point in them doing it if no one watched it. How do you know that they’re not doing it because they like to? You don’t. Even if they are doing it for money, what’s your point? It’s a job just like any other.[/quote]
? There are other means of force than physical force. What about those pushed top prostitution? You think thats a job like any other and is perfectly fine? Most wouldnt be in that position if they didn’t have to be.

[quote=“darkdemun”][quote author=Taios link=topic=232271.msg1987829#msg1987829 date=1199928534]

its a girl or boy decision to be in a sex film or not

Not if they are forced to sell themselves for money because they have none.
[/quote]

you could never be FORCED to sell yourself for money because you have none, there is always other ways of making money[/quote]
What if your homeless? Do you have any idea how hard it is to get money, to sort yourself out, get a house when you have no address?

Read full topic

item.title: So many perverts out there
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:16, topic:172143”]This “embaracment” is the truth, if you look at porn your dirty, none the less selfish. Your selfish because you buy other pictures of girls when they need money, your using them.
No, don’t say they wanted to so i went ahead, its taking advantage of them[/quote]
I didn’t ask for your opinion of truth, I asked for proof. They choose to be porn stars because they enjoy having sex, and what’s so wrong about receiving money for somebody being able to film you doing something you enjoy? If no one bought the films or pictures then the star wouldn’t receive any money, but do you think that would stop them from having sex? No. How is looking at porn dirty? If you ask me going out and sleeping with many women is more dirty than looking at a picture and using my right and/or left hand. You mistaken pornographic material with prostitution when it is not indeed so, porn is money for pictures/film of something you want to do, prostitution is money for the act of sex itself.

Also, its embarrassment.

Read full topic
